Texts.Chs: 首先，亲爱的，你需要^green;重建大地守护团^reset;。我认为你应该从^green;返回前哨站然后和^orange;船厂的企鹅皮特对话开始^reset;。
Texts.Eng: First thing first though, dear; you need to ^green;rebuild the Protectorate^reset;. I think you should start by ^green;returning to the Outpost and speak to ^orange;Penguin Pete the shipyard captain^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 这可不是一般的壮举——干得好，亲爱的。现在我们可以正式开始^green;重现我们的荣光^reset;！
Texts.Eng: That was no mean feat - well done, dear. Now we can truly begin to ^green;rebuild our ranks^reset;!

Texts.Chs: ^green;探索^orange;厄尔吉斯水晶装运公司^reset;。
